Why is it defaulted to Russian? There aren't even any instructions on how to change the language.
How do i change the language?

Change English
1. Copy the files from the folder RUS sl and sl.dir folder Models
2. Rename files sl - gta3, file sl.dir - gta3.dir
3. Txd folder from the folder RUS put in the game directory Grand Theft Auto Vice City Back to the 80's
4. Download file gta-vc.exe and put it in the game directory, confirm replacement
http://dfiles.ru/files/e5bvvyyj7

Change English, French, German, Italian, Spanish
1. Copy the files from the folder RUS sl and sl.dir folder Models
2. Rename files sl - gta3, file sl.dir - gta3.dir
3. Txd folder from the folder RUS put in the game directory Grand Theft Auto Vice City Back to the 80's
4. Download file gta-vc.exe and put it in the game directory, confirm replacement
http://dfiles.ru/files/e5bvvyyj7

English, French, German, Italian, Spanish game version 1.00

Change English, French, German, Italian, Spanish
1. Copy the files from the folder RUS sl and sl.dir , PASTE THEM IN FOLDER CALLED "Models"
2. Rename files sl - gta3, file sl.dir - gta3.dir
3. COPY Txd folder from the folder RUS put in the game directory Grand Theft Auto Vice City Back to the 80's
4. Download file gta-vc.exe and put it in the game directory, confirm replacement
http://dfiles.ru/files/e5bvvyyj7
